body:
I think the warning is mostly for the `t.time :bonus_time` migration than for querying (at least that's what I was thinking about when I proposed it). If you're querying you're on your own already.

@pixeltrix [LocalTime](http://joda-time.sourceforge.net/apidocs/org/joda/time/LocalTime.html) maybe? Having a class for this would be nice, a very simple implementation would just have the same methods `Time` has but would issue deprecation warnings for them and would only answer correctly to hour, minutes, seconds (or even milliseconds). Date and Time handling is usually a pain in the arse on all platforms.
